name: Alien Hunter BETA
description:
This is a battle-city like game from NES with boss battles

Story:

The earth is prepared for a galactic doom war against 3 dangerous alien races. The Attarians, aggressive and ruthless has destroyed more than 365 planets in history. The Skaguras, devilish abominations, has infested an entire galaxy. Lastly, the Oracles, having the most advanced technology in the entire universe. And it's up to the Alien Hunters to defeat them all and protect earth.

Controls:

arrow keys is moving

z is shooting

space is start
